description: menstruum +‎ -ate; sense 2 (“to undergo menstruation”) is possibly a back-formation from menstruation.

verbs.description: menstruate (third-person singular simple present menstruates, present participle menstruating, simple past and past participle menstruated)

entries.meaning: (transitive, obsolete, rare) To stain with or as if with menses.
(intransitive) To undergo menstruation, to have a period.
examples: Synonyms: be on one's period, be on the rag
